name: Pest Control (itch) (drakeclausen)
description:
Pest Control Try to survive as you exterminate endless swarms of increasingly ferocious pests! Controls

WASD = Move

Mouse = Aim

Left Click = Attack

Esc = Pause

Game Play

Survive as long as you can by avoiding the pest's attacks. Exterminate pests to score points and potentially spawn pick-ups that will replenish your resources or power you up. Every 30 seconds the pests grow more ferocious and a fuel pick-up is spawned in a random location.

Credits

Created by: Drake Clausen

Sound assets from:

https://www.zapsplat.com

https://www.opengameart.org

https://www.freesound.org
